posts.post_content:
Looking for a low grade (poor to fair) N172 Tucker (Baltimore.)  Although I am looking for a low grade example, I prefer the card to not be skinned, or, if trimmed, only slightly.  No preference between graded or raw.

[url]jason_carota@comcast.net[/url]

Thanks for looking!

Jason--All I have available is the card of Fullmer tagging Tucker (175-6). It is in very nice shape, however, and is available for sale or trade.

Best---Jay (oldjudge@gmail.com)
Thanks for the offer, Jay, but I am looking for a card of Tucker's where he is the focus (465-1 to 465-5.)
